3389.question: How many furniture components are there in total?

3390.query: SELECT name ,  furniture_id FROM furniture ORDER BY market_rate DESC LIMIT 1
3390.question: Return the name and id of the furniture with the highest market rate.

3391.query: SELECT sum(market_rate) FROM furniture ORDER BY market_rate DESC LIMIT 2
3391.question: find the total market rate of the furnitures that have the top 2 market shares.

3392.query: SELECT Num_of_Component ,  name FROM furniture WHERE Num_of_Component  >  10
3392.question: Find the component amounts and names of all furnitures that have more than 10 components.

3393.query: SELECT name ,  Num_of_Component FROM furniture ORDER BY market_rate LIMIT 1
3393.question: Find the name and component amount of the least popular furniture.

3394.query: SELECT t1.name FROM furniture AS t1 JOIN furniture_manufacte AS t2 ON t1.Furniture_ID  =  t2.Furniture_ID WHERE t2.Price_in_Dollar  <  (SELECT max(Price_in_Dollar) FROM furniture_manufacte)
3394.question: Find the names of furnitures whose prices are lower than the highest price.

3395.query: SELECT open_year ,  name FROM manufacturer ORDER BY num_of_shops DESC LIMIT 1
3395.question: Which manufacturer has the most number of shops? List its name and year of opening.

3396.query: SELECT avg(Num_of_Factories) FROM manufacturer WHERE num_of_shops  >  20
3396.question: Find the average number of factories for the manufacturers that have more than 20 shops.

3397.query: SELECT name ,  manufacturer_id FROM manufacturer ORDER BY open_year
3397.question: List all manufacturer names and ids ordered by their opening year.

3398.query: SELECT name ,  open_year FROM manufacturer WHERE num_of_shops  >  10 OR Num_of_Factories  <  10
3398.question: Give me the name and year of opening of the manufacturers that have either less than 10 factories or more than 10 shops.

3399.query: SELECT max(num_of_shops) ,  avg(Num_of_Factories) FROM manufacturer WHERE open_year  <  1990
3399.question: what is the average number of factories and maximum number of shops for manufacturers that opened before 1990.

3400.query: SELECT t1.manufacturer_id ,  t1.num_of_shops FROM manufacturer AS t1 JOIN furniture_manufacte AS t2 ON t1.manufacturer_id  =  t2.manufacturer_id ORDER BY t2.Price_in_Dollar DESC LIMIT 1
3400.question: Find the id and number of shops for the company that produces the most expensive furniture.

3401.query: SELECT count(*) ,  t1.name FROM manufacturer AS t1 JOIN furniture_manufacte AS t2 ON t1.manufacturer_id  =  t2.manufacturer_id GROUP BY t1.manufacturer_id
3401.question: Find the number of funiture types produced by each manufacturer as well as the company names.

3402.query: SELECT t1.name ,  t2.price_in_dollar FROM furniture AS t1 JOIN furniture_manufacte AS t2 ON t1.Furniture_ID  =  t2.Furniture_ID
3402.question: Give me the names and prices of furnitures which some companies are manufacturing.

3403.query: SELECT Market_Rate ,  name FROM furniture WHERE Furniture_ID NOT IN (SELECT Furniture_ID FROM furniture_manufacte)
3403.question: Find the market shares and names of furnitures which no any company is producing in our records.

3404.query: SELECT t3.name FROM furniture AS t1 JOIN furniture_manufacte AS t2 ON t1.Furniture_ID  =  t2.Furniture_ID JOIN manufacturer AS t3 ON t2.manufacturer_id  =  t3.manufacturer_id WHERE t1.num_of_component  <  6 INTERSECT SELECT t3.name FROM furniture AS t1 JOIN furniture_manufacte AS t2 ON t1.Furniture_ID  =  t2.Furniture_ID JOIN manufacturer AS t3 ON t2.manufacturer_id  =  t3.manufacturer_id WHERE t1.num_of_component  >  10
3404.question: Find the name of the company that produces both furnitures with less than 6 components and furnitures with more than 10 components.
